def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Entity from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityDefinition from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityState
if widget.Entity == None: return registro = widget.Entity if (registro.State == EntityState.Read): botaoPISCOFINSVisible = registro.BotaoPisCofinsVisible() if (not botaoPISCOFINSVisible): widget.View.Commands["CMD_PISCOFINS"].Visible = False
